dress.desc: Cover shoulders and knees in sacred places. A scarf (foulard) is your best ally.

hand.desc: Always use your right hand for eating, giving money, or greeting. The left is considered impure.
hand.title: The Right Hand

shanti.desc: Infinite patience. Chaos is not an error; it's part of the experience. Flow with it, don't fight it.

logistics.title: Travel Logistics

visa.title: Process your Schengen Visa
visa.description: Indian citizens require a short-stay Schengen visa for stays up to 90 days. Apply at least 15 days in advance at BLS centers.

passport.title: Check Passport Validity
passport.description: Your passport must have at least two blank pages, been issued in the last 10 years and be valid for 3 months after departure.

funds.title: Prove Financial Means
funds.description: Authorities may require proof of solvency; the current minimum is approximately 118,40 € per person per day.

insurance.title: Compulsory Health Insurance
insurance.description: It is mandatory to have health insurance with minimum coverage of €30,000 including emergency hospitalization and repatriation.

water.title: Tap Water: Drink with Confidence!
water.description: Unlike other destinations, in Valladolid tap water is soft and of excellent quality, among the best in Spain.

sun.title: Protection from the Castilian Sun
sun.description: In June and summer, the sun is very intense. Use sunscreen, a hat and stay hydrated to avoid heat stroke.

emergency.title: Health Emergencies
emergency.description: In case of any life-threatening emergency, call 112 for free. The health emergency service operates 24 hours.

flights.title: Direct Flights Delhi-Madrid
flights.description: Iberojet operates direct connections between New Delhi and Madrid, facilitating access to the Spanish capital.

ave.title: Connect with AVE (High Speed)
ave.description: From Chamartín station in Madrid, the AVE train will take you to Valladolid in just 1 hour.

valbuena_car.title: Transfer to Valbuena de Duero
valbuena_car.description: Valbuena is in the heart of Ribera del Duero. Taxi or car rental from Valladolid is recommended (approx 45 min).

kiss.title: The Greeting: Two Kisses
kiss.description: It is common to greet with two kisses on the cheeks between women or between men and women. Men usually shake hands.

meal_times.title: Late Meal Times
meal_times.description: Be patient: lunch is usually at 2:00 PM and dinner doesn't start before 9:00 PM.

siesta.title: Respect the Siesta
siesta.description: Some small shops in Valladolid and Valbuena close from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM for rest or lunch.

payments.title: Euro and Digital Payments
payments.description: The official currency is the Euro (€). Madrid and Valladolid are very digitized; use contactless cards for almost everything.

taxfree.title: Tax Free (VAT Savings)
taxfree.description: As a non-EU resident, you can request a VAT refund (generally 21%) on your purchases.

tapas.title: The Art of Tapeo (Pinchos)
tapas.description: Valladolid is famous for its 'pinchos'. Tipping is not mandatory, but rounding up the bill is appreciated.

esim.title: eSIM: Instant Connection
esim.description: The most convenient option is an eSIM (like Holafly or MicroEsim). Configure it from home.

security_net.title: Cybersecurity while Traveling
security_net.description: Avoid public WiFi for banking. It is recommended to use a VPN to protect your personal data.

wine.title: Land of Great Wines
wine.description: Valbuena de Duero is home to prestigious wineries like Vega Sicilia. Enjoy Ribera del Duero red wines.

clothing.title: Layered Clothing
clothing.description: Even if days are warm, nights in the northern plateau can be cool. Always carry a thin jacket.

pickpockets.title: Watch out for Pickpockets
pickpockets.description: Thieves usually act in crowded places. Always keep your backpack or bag closed and in front of you.

petitions.title: The Signature Scam
petitions.description: Distrust people who approach you asking to sign a 'petition'. It is a distraction tactic.

rosemary.title: The Rosemary Sprig
rosemary.description: In tourist areas, they may offer you a sprig of rosemary to 'read your fortune' and then demand money.

taxi_fixed.title: Taxis: Fixed Rate
taxi_fixed.description: Barajas Airport - Madrid center transfer costs €33 (fixed). Ensure the meter is working for other trips.

menu_prices.title: Menus without Prices
menu_prices.description: Some restaurants do not include prices on specials. Always ask for the price before ordering.

fake_charity.title: Fake Charities
fake_charity.description: Scammers pose as NGO volunteers to ask for cash donations. Only collaborate through official channels.

items.q: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
